column4: Hi all! :) What is the service "SSDP". This service is trying to connect at port 1900. Any malicious? It's another Ubuntu computer in the net that is trying to do that... Also a Unknown service from the same computer is trying to connect at port 21328...:/
yeah, I looked at that. But I didn't really get he message...
Why would it send that to me? Or is that something Ubuntu normally does? ;l
